g++    -g -std=c++0x -isystem/usr/include -W -Wall -ffor-scope -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/ngt.dir/ngt.cpp.o  -o ../inst/bin/ngt  -L/Users/nicolabertoldi/Work/Software/IRSTLM/GitHubRepository/irstlm_CLION/inst/lib  ../inst/lib/libirstlm.a -lm -lz -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/Users/nicolabertoldi/Work/Software/IRSTLM/GitHubRepository/irstlm_CLION/inst/lib
